title: Is this an announcement by a kid who claims to have been born by Michael Jackson?
subtitle: In the 1993 announcement made by 13-year-old J. Chandler in a lawsuit against Michael Jackson, the boy claimed to have been sexually harassed by the singer.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Court ' s declaration was made by 13-year-old Michael Jackson, who was allegedly harassed in 1993.
